name: BloodBoarderz
description:
Race to the finish line and satisfy your murderous wishes while you go down the bloody mountains dodging obstacles and slaying your enemies!

- Cool 3D Retro graphics
- Action-filled and fast gameplay
- Blood and Gore
- Easy to learn, but difficult to master

Controls 🏂

Right/Left Mouse Button - Swing your knife Right/Left
W/S - Accelerate/Brake
A/D - Go Right/Left

3D and 2D art: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan

Music:  Ryan Rauch
